name: horecastore-test-automation
description: Node.js based test automation project using JavaScript and Playwright

scripts.test: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=UAE TEST_PERSONA=private && npx playwright test --config=./playwright.config.js --headed --reporter=line --grep "@mobile"
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack: cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --grep "@desktop"
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:prod:usa:site-: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=USA TEST_PERSONA=private && cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --reporter=html --no-open --grep "@desktop"
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:prod:uae:site-: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=UAE TEST_PERSONA=private && cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --reporter=html --no-open --grep "@desktop"
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:ui: cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --grep "@desktop" --ui
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:debug: cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --grep "@desktop" --debug
scripts.test:mobile-browserstack: cp browserstack-mobile.yml browserstack.yml && npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test --grep "@mobile"
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:dev: cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && TEST_ENV=dev npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:mobile-browserstack:dev: cp browserstack-mobile.yml browserstack.yml && TEST_ENV=dev npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:staging: cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && TEST_ENV=staging npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:mobile-browserstack:staging: cp browserstack-mobile.yml browserstack.yml && TEST_ENV=staging npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:desktop-browserstack:prod: cp browserstack-desktop.yml browserstack.yml && TEST_ENV=prod npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:mobile-browserstack:prod: cp browserstack-mobile.yml browserstack.yml && TEST_ENV=prod npx browserstack-node-sdk playwright test
scripts.test:desktop-lt:prod:usa:site-check: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=USA TEST_PERSONA=private LT_GEOLOCATION=US LT_TIMEZONE=New_York && executeOn=lambdatest npx playwright test --grep "@desktop" --config=./playwright.config.lt.desktop.js
scripts.test:desktop-lt:prod:uae:site-check: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=UAE TEST_PERSONA=private LT_GEOLOCATION=AE LT_TIMEZONE=Dubai && executeOn=lambdatest npx playwright test --grep "@desktop" --config=./playwright.config.lt.desktop.js
scripts.test:mobile-lt:prod:usa:site-check: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=USA TEST_PERSONA=business LT_GEOLOCATION=US LT_TIMEZONE=New_York && executeOn=lambdatest npx playwright test --grep "@mobile" --config=./playwright.config.lt.mobile.js
scripts.test:mobile-lt:prod:uae:site-check: export TEST_ENV=prod TEST_MARKET=UAE TEST_PERSONA=business LT_GEOLOCATION=AE LT_TIMEZONE=Dubai && executeOn=lambdatest npx playwright test --grep "@mobile" --config=./playwright.config.lt.mobile.js
